description: A unique two-in-one solution that combines the innovations of Gore-Tex INFINIUM™ and Allied Down & Feather, Direct North is the skiable down jacket that will make you give up your heavyweight synthetic for good. Providing warmth without the weight, you'll float through untracked powder freely, skating right into your après scene with the same ease and comfort. For any mountain local that wants one layer to cover all the bases of a winter at altitude, get down with a jacket that you can wear on and off the slopes.
name: Mountain Hardwear Direct North GTX Down Jacket - Mens
